response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $8,000 to me due to its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its creation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,500. I believe this offer presents a fantastic chance for you to experience the unparalleled quality and functionality firsthand. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
